channel.itunes:summary: Are tired of riding the roller coaster ride of the your financial journey. This podcast is designed to help you make informed decisions about your financial future.

item.title: Weekend Forex Technical Analysis Trading Plan for Sunday, September 4th
item.itunes:author: Michael Glass
item.dc:creator: Michael Glass
item.description: Here is our Weekend Forex Technical Analysis Trading Plan to help day traders to learn how to trade Forex Currency Pairs by identifying high probability trading setups. In this video, we discuss key technical analysis price levels for USD/CHF EUR/USD GBP/USD and Gold. We look at each forex pair on multiple time frames to identify key support and resistance price levels. We also look at price levels to setup on various pairs based upon the current trend.
item.content:encoded: Here is our Weekend Forex Technical Analysis Trading Plan to help day traders to learn how to trade Forex Currency Pairs by identifying high probability trading setups. In this video, we discuss key technical analysis price levels for USD/CHF EUR/USD GBP/USD and Gold. We look at each forex pair on multiple time frames to identify key support and resistance price levels. We also look at price levels to setup on various pairs based upon the current trend.

item.itunes:keywords: forex, forex trading, day trading, stock market, money, finance , technical analysis, learn forex

item.title: Developing a Trader's Mindset Interview Series - Peter Reznicek
item.itunes:author: Michael Glass
item.dc:creator: Michael Glass
item.description: Developing a Trader’s Mindset is the key for both new and seasoned traders to become profitable. A Trading Mindset helps you to not only recognize candlestick chart patterns as they develop, but it also helps have the discipline to wait for the pattern to confirm. In our First Installment in our interview series, we talk to Peter Reznicek better known as the Shadow Trader.
item.content:encoded: Developing a Trader’s Mindset is the key for both new and seasoned traders to become profitable. A Trading Mindset helps you to not only recognize candlestick chart patterns as they develop, but it also helps have the discipline to wait for the pattern to confirm. In our First Installment in our interview series, we talk to Peter Reznicek better known as the Shadow Trader.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this installment, we talk with Peter Reznicek, AKA Shadow Trader, from Think or Swim. He shares the importance of being present while trading. He also shares key trading strategies for new and experienced traders.
item.itunes:summary: Developing a Trader’s Mindset is the key for both new and seasoned traders to become profitable. A Trading Mindset helps you to not only recognize candlestick chart patterns as they develop, but it also helps have the discipline to wait for the pattern
item.itunes:keywords: shadow trader, day trading, technical analysis, chart patterns, stock market, invest, investing, investor, money, finance,

item.title: Weekend Stock Market Technical Analysis Trading Plan for August 13th
item.itunes:author: Michael Glass
item.dc:creator: Michael Glass
item.description: Here is our Weekend Stock Market Technical Analysis Trading Plan for Saturday, August 13th. In each video update , we attempt to identify high probability trading setups for the next week. We also look at the key market moving events of the past week including the S&P downgrade of the US Debt and continued banking concerns in Europe. We then pull up the charts to identify key technical analysis price levels for the S&P 500. We then look to see if some of the market leaders are pulling the market higher or lower (Apple, Amazon, Google, Goldman Sachs, Netflix and Priceline). We also try gain insight to the market’s future direction by looking at the charts for The Dollar, Gold and Crude Oil. Finally, in our education spotlight, we look at the importance of not risking more money than you can afford to lose.
